Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People on Twitter have spoken up about various political issues in Australia. Some feel that the government has a chance to make things right for disadvantaged members of society with the upcoming budget. A UK-US alliance prompting billions in submarine costs hasn't helped with this image. Moreover there has been a call for adequate income support for all people including those seeking asylum. These tweets highlight different aspects of #auspol and show that people are paying attention.
